about_the_game:
Explore an Explosive World of Strategy and Reflection!

Immerse yourself in a turn-based 3D tactical puzzle game that tests your strategic skills. Guide a bomb through stimulating grid-based levels, where every move counts. Face unique challenges, unlock achievements, plan your strategy and survive to claim victory. Are you prepared to tackle the most challenging puzzles?

Key Features:

  • 25 Unique Levels: Go through a variety of levels, each presenting unique challenges and objectives.
  • Unlock 25 Achievements: Showcase your skills by unlocking 25 achievements, earned by completing each level with 100 life points.
  • Explosive Tactical Puzzles: Engage in a captivating blend of puzzle-solving and tactical decision-making, putting your thinking skills to the test.
  • Strategic Buffs and Debuffs: Consider the strategically placed buffs and debuffs throughout the various levels, adding a tactical dimension to every decision.

Face 8 Types of Enemies:

Discover imposing opponents, each possessing distinct characteristics. Anticipate their moves to survive, but beware – when they fuse, they become even more powerful!

  • Pyrospheric: Walks on magma cubes without taking damage.
  • Hydrospheric: Walks on water cubes.
  • Atmospheric: Jumps up to 4 cubes instead of 2.
  • Terraspheric: Reduces the player's damage resistance.
  • Chronospheric: Add 2 turns to the game.
  • Tempospheric: Skips the next player's turn.
  • Sinistospheric: Inflicts fatal damage to the player.
  • Electrospheric: Moves by 2 cubes instead of 1.

Fusion Rule:

If enemies are at the same level, the moving one consumes the stationary one; otherwise, the higher-level always consumes the lower-level.

Buffs and Debuffs:

The player can pick up buffs and debuffs by passing through or by finishing on them. These effects apply only to the player.

Achievement Hunter Tips:

  • Sometimes, it's better to skip your turn on the current cube.
  • Be aware of the enemies playing order to take advantage of it.
  • Git Gud.

Developer's Note:

I'm thrilled to share this game with you. Your support means the world to me as a solo developer. Have fun and good luck!
